pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gaussian Process Regression for Functional Data Analysis // Functionalities for modelling functional data with multidimensional inputs, multivariate functional data, and non- separable and/or non-stationary covariance structure of function-valued processes. In addition, there are functionalities for functional regression models where the mean function depends on scalar and/or functional covariates and the covariance structure depends on functional covariates. The development version of the package can be found on https://github.com/gpfda/GPFDA-dev.
